meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Brian Rafferty Lizzie Turner Steve Belding Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7209.

td.p: Brian Rafferty, a public information office supervisor from Forest Hills, New York
Lizzie Turner, a student originally from Birmingham, Alabama
Steve Belding, an engineer from Knoxville, Tennessee (whose 2-day cash winnings total $48,402)

tr.td: SHOW ME WHAT YOU GOT!
LIVING THE SPACED-OUT LIFE
LAST EPISODES
CALIFORNIA CITY‑"O"
(Alex: Each correct response will end in that letter of the alphabet.)
JAMES: THE FIRST OR LAST NAME
WHICH DISNEY DWARF?

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'About 80% of its people live on two out of the 700 coral islands that make up this nation')
